books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: Between life and death there is a library, and within that library, the shelves go on forever. Every book provides a chance to try another life you could have lived.

chapters.title: Chapter 1: The Midnight Library
chapters.content: Nineteen years before she decided to die, Nora Seed sat in the warmth of the small library at Hazeldene School in the town of Bedford...

chapters.title: Chapter 2: The First Life
chapters.content: Nora opened the first book and found herself in a completely different life...

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: Tiny Changes, Remarkable Results. An easy & proven way to build good habits & break bad ones.

chapters.title: Chapter 1: The Surprising Power of Atomic Habits
chapters.content: Why small habits make a big difference...
